mapper.select: select t.order_no, r.cover_url, r.title, r.verify_no, t.scenic_id, t.scenic_name, t.category, r.pay_type, r.num, r.refund_type, r.refund_state, r.price, r.discount_amount, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.complete_time, t.visit_date, r.mobile, r.state, r.remark from `order` r inner join ticket_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.deleted = false and r.member_id = #{memberId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo}

select t.title as productTitle, t.store_id, t.cover_url as productCover, r.ticket_id as productId from ticket_order r inner join `order` t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.id = #{orderId} and t.order_no = #{orderNo} and t.deleted = false

select t.order_no, t.merchant_id from ticket_order r inner join `order` t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.deleted = false and r.deleted = false and t.state = 2 and r.verification_type = 2 and r.visit_date < curdate()

select t.order_no, r.cover_url, r.title, t.scenic_id, t.scenic_name, t.category, r.trade_no, t.verification_type, t.visit_date, r.pay_type, r.num, r.refund_type, r.refund_state, r.price, r.discount_amount, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.complete_time, r.mobile, r.state, r.refund_state, r.close_time, r.close_type, t.use_time, t.real_buy, r.remark from `order` r inner join ticket_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.deleted = false and r.order_no = #{orderNo}
and r.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
